setting.value:
It is with great excitement that we announce the launch of a new forum site dedicated to providing the best support for all of your Android TV technical support needs.
If you own an Android TV device and need any type of help or assistance, CABLE CUTTERS is the place to be!
Visit the new CABLE CUTTERS Forums today for [COLOR white]Android TV Support[/COLOR]: [B][COLOR white]http://forums.cablecutters.com[/COLOR][/B]
Don't forget to [COLOR white]Register[/COLOR] today to find out about a very special NVIDIA Shield TV giveaway contest happening very soon!
